cards.title: Safety Tips
cards.desc: Learn how to stay safe and protect others.

cards.title: Emergency
cards.desc: Call 15 in case of immediate danger.

safety.title: Be Aware
safety.content: Stay alert in public spaces and avoid distractions like phones when walking. Awareness can help you react quickly if something feels unsafe.

safety.title: Travel Safe
safety.content: Use well-lit routes and avoid isolated areas, especially at night. Always share your travel plans with a trusted friend or family member.

safety.title: Protect Information
safety.content: Do not share personal details with strangers online or offline. Use strong passwords and update them regularly for better security.

safety.title: Emergency Contacts
safety.content: Keep important contacts like family, friends, and local authorities saved in your phone. Quick access can make a big difference in emergencies.

safety.title: Home Safety
safety.content: Always lock doors and windows, even when at home. Install proper lighting and consider security systems for added protection.

banner.title: Together for a Safer Community
banner.subtitle: Report crime, protect lives, and create awareness.
